lead_paragraph: Eighty entrepreneurs from abroad will set up shop on seven campuses, advising professors and students while starting their own businesses.

headline.main: CUNY Schools to Lure Foreign Entrepreneurs With New Visa Program

snippet: Eighty entrepreneurs from abroad will set up shop on seven campuses, advising professors and students while starting their own businesses.
abstract: New York City Economic Development and City University of New York will announce new visa program meant for immigrant entrepreneurs; plan will give 80 foreign entrepreneurs temporary work visa in exchange for their presence on campus to advise professors and students.
